author: Sean Ware
description: This unusual riff on the classic mimosa unusually calls for redcurrant jelly and sweet clementine juice, topped with rosé champagne.
name: Rose Memoire
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Tangerine / Mandarin / Clementine juice (fresh juice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first two ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
